metadata.name: In a search of ETHER ( Ch.1 )
metadata.description:
Long ago from the dawn of the universe, there was nothing. Then..boom. The explosion led to the creation of some  elements.Those elements had the power to control all 9 realms
The ether is a remnant of one of the  singularities which existed before the universe. After the universe came to be, the Big Bang forged the power into Elemental crystals. Ether had the ability to allows the user to Control and manipulate souls.
Long before the birth of light there was darkness,and that darkness came from the Night Hails, Trillennia ago, most ruthless of their kind, the lord of the night Hails,Zyrian
sought to transform 9 realms back into one of eternal night. Such evil was able through Control the power of ether, an ancient force of ethernal destruction.
Due to its unique power, it appear at a specific place ,when 9 realms come together.
To save the ether from the hands of darkness all the powerful monks came together to protect the power of ether under the command of kings of each realm.

TBC
